Bevel

Bevel 3-in-1 Hair Oil

Sale price$11.95 Regular price$0.00(/)

*20% OFF APPLIED AT CHECKOUT

Bevel 3-in-1 Hair Oil. Moisturize, nourish, and add shine with a lightweight formula designed to promote healthy-looking hair.

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Moisturizes Scalp: Helps combat dryness while keeping skin balanced.

  • Nourishes Strands: Strengthens hair from root to tip for healthier growth.

  • Adds Natural Shine: Lightweight finish that won’t weigh hair down.

  • Infused With Oils That Work: Tea tree, jojoba, and Jamaican black castor oils for scalp and strand care.

USUALLY SHIPS IN 1 BUSINESS DAY

30 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE

FOR BEST USE

Apply directly to scalp and hair, wet or dry. For scalp moisturization, massage gently into scalp as often as needed. Do not rinse out. For twists, locs, and curls, apply directly to hair and style as usual.

Full Ingredients

Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Isododecane, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol.
